entries.title: Victory claims over small Ukrainian town expose rift among Russian forces
entries.description: A rare Russian claim of military victory in eastern Ukraine has laid bare a bitter rift between Moscow's military chiefs and the head of a private mercenary

entries.title: Vatican holds funeral for Cardinal George Pell who decried Pope Francis’ rule

entries.title: U.K. condemns ‘barbaric’ execution of British-Iranian accused of spying in Iran
entries.description: Iran has executed British-Iranian national Alireza Akbari, the judiciary’s Mizan news agency reported on Saturday.

entries.title: Top Brazilian court authorizes investigation into whether Bolsonaro incited riot
